description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
 
40318 - Support Tables in XLS files
40423 - Customizing the Ribbon XML
40452 - Support Workbook.ContentTypeProperties
 
Enhancements
 
40440 - IF() Formula returns “0” instead of “#N/A”
40345 - Problems with FirstPageNumber property
40413 - Layout changed when document is converted to PDF
40135 - The property 'DragData' is missing in 'PivotField'
40246 - Change DataSource on Pivot Table.
40377 - Issues with Pivot Tables
40360 - Convert Workflow diagram/shapes to image(s)
 
Performance
 
40271 - Worksheet.RemoveFormulas - performance issue
40063 - Pdf Generation => OutOfMemoryException
40317 - Excessive memory usage when converting Excel-to-PDF
40369 - Save to PDF uses 3GB for a 10MB Excel file  
40409 - Opening Workbook takes too long to open
 
Exceptions
 
40405 - NullReference exception during Save operation if copying worksheet from other workbook
40380 - Crash on Workbook.CalculateFormula() method
40439 - RowSpan Attribute throws Exception
40446 - ArgumentOutOfRangeException occurred while initializing the file
 
Bugs
 
40320 - VLOOKUP and OFFSET functions issues
40373 - IRR is not computed correctly
40396 - MS Excel Calculations’ problems
40430 - Array Formula using Indirect() function copies only 1 value
40435 - CellsException in calculating TREND() formula
40374 - Copy worksheet replaces header and footer
40398 - Problem Printing Excel file with embedded EMF images
40382 - Pivot Table Issue - Formatting Filter bug
40431 - PivotField - Reading items from the cache
40429 - Multiple issues while upgrading to latest versions
40365 - Creating Workbook with InputStream is not working
40393 - Generated XLS file is crashing MS Excel 
40394 - Dropdown and Chart are removed from workbook after Save
40424 - Aspose.Cells not correctly applying custom cell’s formatting
40367 - XLSM files are corrupted under certain conditions 
40407 - The Cell Font size format with non-integer number changed
40415 - Insert Symbol at the end of a cell value
 
2) GridDesktop
 
Bugs
 
40341 - Graph values are wrongly displayed for XLSX file
40314 - SUM() issue in GridDesktop’s worksheet
40370 - GridDesktop.ImportExcelFile() throws exception
40371 - Index was outside the bounds of the array
40383 - GridDestop’s issue on formula cell(s)
40406 - Griddesktop.ImportExcelFile() throws OutOfMemoryException
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
